price: Ó sọ pé: “Ṣé ẹ̀yin yóò máa jọ́sìn fún n̄ǹkan tí kò lè ṣe yín ní àǹfààní, tí kò sì lè kó ìnira ba yín lẹ́yìn Allāhu?
arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla afataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿukum shayan walā yaḍurrukum
